Table	Create Table
courses	CREATE TABLE `courses` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `regionId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `description` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `framework` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `level` enum('fundamentals','advanced','specialist') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `durationHours` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `price` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `stripePriceId` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `modules` json DEFAULT NULL,
  `prerequisites` json DEFAULT NULL,
  `certificationRequired` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `active` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `price3Month` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `price6Month` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `price12Month` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `stripePriceId3Month` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `stripePriceId6Month` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `stripePriceId12Month` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=90001
